channel.title: XenuPkz 667/728 ~Dev Team/Staff Needed~
channel.description:
Hello, Moparians! I am looking for some dedicated Java coders who are looking to be in the development team on my server. I have coded this server almost from scratch (The base was a Delta. Slowly modified the code and now it's a stable 667 loading 728, and hopefully 742 to come. You can't even tell it's a Delta!). I would like to keep all contact to Skype. I am also looking for staff BTW. **No Co-Owners/Head Staff**
[center][b]Interested?[/b][/center] [center][shadow=red,left]Fill out the form below, post it in the comments, or send it to me on Skype[/shadow].[/center]
[code]Name: Online Nickname (optional): Age (over 12 only, must be mature. You can state 'mature', if you don't feel like stating your age): How Long You Have Been Coding RSPS's/What staff positon?: Level of Experience [Ignore this if you want staff](beginner, average, advanced, expert): Why you want to be apart of us:[/code] [center] Site to come! My Skype: imperial.chime
[code]Credit's for source: Runescape 5% - Cache Delta - Base 10% Luminosity 474 V1 - 474 code & cache 5% Mezzyscape 508 v4 - Where I based the code off of, and got some code & cache & new client from 10% Dementhium 639 - Based the 639 code off of (I made my source into a mess) & cache & client 5% Disturbed 667 - Based all code off of this, used some .java's, cache & client 15% RsCalifornia 704 - Basically copied most of the source (Didn't know much about 667+ at the time) 10% Matrix - Used cache, almost all code 10% Me - All the rest of the code, including some cache modifications, and the 2 years spent of my life on this 40%[/code] Note: Not all these modifications worked. At some points if I messed up, I started over on these sources.
Need more info? Post below![/center]

item.title: XenuPkz 667/728 ~Dev Team/Staff Needed~
item.dc:creator: @Chimerica Chimerica
item.description:
@Chimerica wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:6, topic:480880”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=599117.msg4211818#msg4211818 date=1359675888]
It sounds messy as love if it’s a delta 667.
[/quote]
I think he also meant that the code is real junky and buggy.[/quote]

Haha, it used to be. Took me at least two months to fix all the mistakes I made. It currently has no errors. I used to be a horrible coder. Now I can get my way through Java just fine. The source works as well as any other, just about. It’s around 75% done.

P.S. I updated the post.

Read full topic

item.title: XenuPkz 667/728 ~Dev Team/Staff Needed~
item.dc:creator: @Chimerica Chimerica
item.description:
@Chimerica wrote:

ox random xi:

It sounds messy as fvck if it’s a delta 667.

It’s not messy at all. It’s actually insanely stable. No errors so far.

If you want to give it a test run (still in development), I’ll post a .jar/webclient link.

Read full topic

item.title: XenuPkz 667/728 ~Dev Team/Staff Needed~
item.dc:creator: @Chimerica Chimerica
item.description:
@Chimerica wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

How do you morph a Delta into a 614?

It was from 317 to 474, then to 508, 614… I’ve based the code off of some other popular sources… If I host it, or release It, it’ll have full credits.

Read full topic
